title: () -
description: Several parking spaces around the intersection. Next to the supermarket, very quiet. You can walk to the city and you are in the center in 2 minutes. Assets of Cultural Interest include the Torre del Caracol, the Hospital de la Piedad, the Churches of Santa María del Azogue and San Juan del Mercado.

title: (49600) Benavente - 41 Arrabal Borregil Pago
description: Service area for motorhomes inaugurated on 05/08/2022 with drinking water services (taken from a box on the ground), emptying of black and gray water. There is also a water fountain. There is a small children's play park and picnic tables. The city center is 10 minutes away. Next door there is a supermarket and Valvarce gas station. Urbanized area with light. It currently has 4 places and the possibility of expanding according to demand. Thanks to the town hall for having opted for this type of tourism. Quiet at night, no noise

title: (49600) Benavente - 27 Calle Renueva
description: Laundry near the motorhome area a couple of streets walking

title: (49600) Benavente - 9 Calle Simón Bolívar
description: Staroil gas station with very clean showers in Benavente. Here is Keil LPG.

title: (49600) Benavente - 13 Calle la Viña

title: (49600) Benavente - 11 Calle Miguel Delibes
description:
Self-service laundry with the possibility of paying by card.
Hot water shower.
Local air-conditioned.
WIFI zone.
Free parking.
Very close to supermarkets, separated from the urban center and very accessible from the highway exit.
Hours from 7 a.m. to midnight.

title: (49600) Benavente - 17 Carretera Estación
description: Benavente. Parking at the old station. Garden area. Very calm. 5 minutes from the old town. Good place for tapas. Fountain in the park and bar in the park. Next to municipal swimming pools. Greenway. Barbecues and tables near the tourist hostel.

title: (49600) Benavente - 97 Calle la Rosaleda
description: A very quiet area next to the bullring, sports center

title: (49600) Benavente - 29 Calle Castrogonzalo

title_short: (49620) Santa Cristina de la Polvorosa - 7 Avenida Constitución

title: (49660) Castropepe -

title: (49660) Castrogonzalo - 2 Calle Río

title_short: (49693) Morales de Rey - 2 Calle el Puente

The area belongs to the Ruta Raia Norte (the first cross-border route for motorhomes in Europe) with the support of the Castilian and Leonese motorhome association (ACYLA). It has 8 parking spaces, gray water emptying area and terminal for water change. black, in addition, drinking water can be recharged, somewhat cumbersome to be able to carry out the entire process. Good routes for walking and mountain biking. Grocery store bakery and bar, very close. Located in the urban area of the town.

title: (49622) Quintanilla de Urz - Unnamed Road

title: (24797) San Adrián del Valle - 17C Calle José Antonio Cabañeros
title_short: (24797) San Adrián del Valle - 17C Calle José Antonio Cabañeros
description: A very quiet and simple town. surrounded by excavated cellars for private use, for more than 200 years. This area was dedicated to wine, the whole land was made up of vines. The neighbors are very friendly and some sell products from the garden: eggs, potatoes etc. The camper area has electricity, water and a laundry room that has been converted into a children's pool, children's area and a river where you can see crabs and fish . Very nice. Bar 100 meters away, possibility of meals, prior reservation, paellas, portions ... good prices, ask at the bar.

title: (49622) Quintanilla de Urz - Autovia Rías Bajas Km
title_short: (49622) Quintanilla de Urz - Autovia Rías Bajas Km
description: Parking at the restaurant where also truck drivers stay overnight. No problem for one night. Good and cheap food and drink. Inside very clean. No disposal, water etc.

title: (49624) Micereces de Tera - ZA-V-2527
description: Picnic area of Micereces de Tera. It has picnic tables under the trees, a shabby playground, a river beach, and in the summer restrooms, a free pool with a drinks kiosk.

title: (49622) Cunquilla de Vidriales -
description: Small car park well set back from the motorable track. Possible to go there with a heavy weight and enough room to maneuver (for us 12T and 9m long). Nice view, super quiet place to spend a completely isolated night. Fairly flat terrain. We were not disturbed. No service apart from a trash can; you have to be completely independent.

title: (49622) Granucillo - Unnamed Road
description: Desert area change of scenery assured, accessible by a track. no service, no shadow zone.

title: (24761) Alija del Infantado - 22 Plaza Mayor
description: We came to this town because they told us that they were doing a day of children's activities and it was a success. There is a fairy forest, they organized a play with goblins and there was a nightly bonfire for children. Brutal. They told us that the city council allows overnight stays in the entire town and we slept behind the castle. Our little boy was delighted and the people of the town were super welcoming, especially Eva, the organizer of the children's play day (she even offered us a cable so that we could connect to the current in her house. We didn't need it). Thank you!!!

title: (24220) Valderas - Camino del Molino
description: water point

title: (49626) Santa Croya de Tera - 30 Calle Prado
title_short: (49626) Santa Croya de Tera - 30 Calle Prado
description: Nice area to stop. Land not paved but fairly flat. Very quiet at night. The swimming pool on the river is magnificent. Very popular place for locals to spend the afternoon. Nearby there is a bar, a butcher and a small grocery store.

title: (49148) Santa Eulalia de Tábara - 4 Plaza Mayor St Eulali
title_short: (49148) Santa Eulalia de Tábara - 4 Plaza Mayor St Eulali
description: Camino detrás del frontón del pueblo. Al lado de un parque infantil.  Tranquilo por la noche. No tiene servicios. Perfecto para pernoctar una noche. Espacio para una o dos furgonetas/ac. Pueblo muy tranquilo con un bar pero sin más servicios. En el parque infantil hay mesas para comer.

title: (49630) Villalpando - 5 Carretera Zamora
description: Coming from Zamora, on the CL 612 at the entrance to Villalpando, turn right before the Repsol petrol station to reach the small bus station. Go around the covered parking of buses and sit on the left, closer to the building to capture the wifi signal (Public) cafeteria and mitigate the noise of the busy national. The place is mundane and without service dedicated to motorhomes, however it is a good plan to spend the night. The cafeteria is open from 7 am to 5 am and the (well maintained) toilets are accessible. The staff is welcoming. The Guardia Civil conducts regular rounds, all night, in the station and in the car park. I also spoke with one of these police patrols, very friendly, who advised me the location and reassured in terms of security.

title: (49630) Villalpando - 91 Calle Olleros
description: Children's park with fountain and area with gym equipment. 300 meters from the square. Bars and restaurants. Close to the highway, but without noise. Perfect for resting or spending the night

title: (24234) Laguna de Negrillos - 19 Calle el Jardín
title_short: (24234) Laguna de Negrillos - 19 Calle el Jardín
description: Area with drinking water, gray / black, wastebaskets. Located next to the 12th century castle. Quiet and safe to spend the night. The town deserves a walk. In the eco-sanitary areas and points they are for the exclusive use of motorhomes and campers. Tourism Law of the Junta de Castilla y León. You cannot remove any camping elements such as tables, chairs, awning and leveling wedges.

title: (24234) Laguna de Negrillos - 13 Calle Santa Cruz
title_short: (24234) Laguna de Negrillos - 13 Calle Santa Cruz

title: (49630) Villalpando - Carretera Madrid Coruña

title: (49742) Riego del Camino - 11 Calle Pozo

title: (24237) - 1010 Lugar Toral Guzmanes

title_short: (24237) Toral de los Guzmanes - 16 Calle Ronda Alta

title: (49128) Cañizo - 1 Calle Clavel
description: Ac free parking area of recent construction, with 6 electricity outlets (ask at the bar or at the town hall) spread over 3 posts. Each post has 2 water intakes with a quick connector for hose and drain for gray and black water. It is next to the town's recreation area, which has a playground, soccer/basketball/handball court, paddle tennis court (for a fee, can be reserved at the bar and at the Town Hall). From here you can visit the Villafáfila Lagoons, a crossing point for numerous migratory birds. Only 35 km from Zamora capital.

title: (49332) Camarzana de Tera - ZA-105
description: Picnic area next to the river.

title: (49140) Tábara - N-631
description: Picnic area, with barbecue and shades

title: (49144) San Cebrián de Castro -
description: Location inside the ramparts, in grass, slightly sloping away from the main path that goes to the ruined castle, beautiful view of the river, no waste bins there I spent three nights without any worries

title: (49144) San Cebrián de Castro - Camino al Castillo
title_short: (49144) San Cebrián de Castro - Camino al Castillo
description: Space at the edge of the river just under the walls. some trees for the shadows. very quiet but access 1 can rock and roll so more for vans than for big cc. for access follow the path to the castle and turn left at the crossroads just before with the pillar of the via del platta. follow the path.

title: (49144) San Cebrián de Castro - 13 Calle Pozo
title_short: (49144) San Cebrián de Castro - 13 Calle Pozo
description: Dirt parking next to the village bar, picnic area with tables, barbecue and drinking water, football and basketball courts, open all year round and free, bar toilets, 50 meters car wash and electric car charging. Very quiet town, very friendly people.

title: (24200) Valencia de Don Juan - CL-621
description: DAY ONLY car park, ideal for public outdoor swimming pools in Valencia Don Juan. It is actually like an aquapark but much cheaper as it is municipal. 100% recommended visit. restaurants paddle tennis soccer basketball ping pong and many swimming pools with tubes to jump into. After the day A RECENTLY REFURBISHED AREA in the same town, very close to this point and with a pleasant environment, close to everything. Locality worth visiting. It has everything (Cinema, Supermarkets, Workshops, gas station, lots of tapas in bars, etc...)

name: Area de autocaravanas Valencia de Don Juan
title: (24200) Area de autocaravanas Valencia de Don Juan
title_short: (24200) Area de autocaravanas Valencia de Don Juan
description: Free area, near the town. Next to soccer field, school, heated pool, paddle tennis courts and sports hall. Ideal for sleeping and resting in a quiet place. A town with a lot of atmosphere, shops, supermarkets, banks and a GREAT recreational pool area with slides and games in summer. Two emptying and filling zones. Only motorhomes and camper. Two nearby campsites for caravans. THURSDAY market in the square. Workshops, restaurants, banks, shops of all kinds in the town and very close to the area. MITLE Museum, Garden of the Ducks and Esla viewpoint next to the castle, Church of San Pedro, Casa del Gaudí Coyantino. February agricultural machinery fair. In summer with fairs and activities many weekends. Patron Saint Festivities in September.

name: Camping Pico Verde
title: (24200) Camping Pico Verde

title: (24200) Valencia de Don Juan - CL-621

In the town (Valencia de Don Juan) there is a nice recently renovated area that although it has no shade at the moment since the trees are still young, it is located in a nice spot and close to everything. The town is worth visiting. Cinema, Super, Gas station, Workshops, Shops. THURSDAY market, ETC.

title: (24200) Valencia de Don Juan - 10 Avenida de Mayorga
title_short: (24200) Valencia de Don Juan - 10 Avenida de Mayorga

title_short: (24200) Valencia de Don Juan - Carretera Villamañán

Behind the large sports complex you can stop under the works or at the water's edge. Quiet place to rock to the sound of the water with picnic tables and barbecue. Right next to it, a path for walking or cycling takes you to the center of the city. The road is passable and narrow, ideal for converted vans.

title: (47680) Mayorga - 6 Calle Corrillo de la Ermita
title_short: (47680) Mayorga - 6 Calle Corrillo de la Ermita
description: Quiet place, with space for several motorhomes, in some places chocks are required, there is emptying and filling of water.

name: Puente Paulón
title: (24763) Puente Paulón
description: River beach next to La Bañeza, with a beach bar and grills, perfect for sleeping peacefully and taking a bath in the Orbigo River.

title: (24750) La Bañeza - 4 Carretera León
description: Parking in front of the sports center, flat and quiet area. Pools next door and a DIA supermarket, we slept without problems.

title: (49550) Ferreruela - Unnamed Road
description: Magnificent picnic area where you can spend the night with all the tranquility of the world, dawn in silence and with a bit of luck being able to see deer in the early morning, the town is about 1 km away, although it only has a bar.

title: (47670) Becilla de Valderaduey - 260 N-601
description: Hostal ria de vigo camper welcome boss nice terrace wi fi

title: (24240) Santa María del Páramo - 12 Calle la Canal
title_short: (24240) Santa María del Páramo - 12 Calle la Canal
description: Parking on Calle12 street. Water. Drain. Toilet. Sports Center. Municipal pool and spa. Dominical market so street turns into market. Closed on Mondays

title: (49149) Montamarta - 17 Rincón Reblo
description: Nice shady spot next to the hermitage of La Virgen del Castillo. Good views. Only room for a few vans. Not suitable for motorhomes.

title: (49149) Montamarta - 2 Calle San Vicente
description: New area for motorhomes with a small park for children, paddle tennis court and green area. Leisure: surroundings of the Esla reservoir (fishing, water sports, etc.), municipal swimming pool, sports pavilion (including the pelota court), children's playground. Health: primary care and pharmacy (first-aid kit) Services: gas station, forge workshop, plumbing Residence for the elderly, which includes the "soup kitchen" open to all registered residents. It stands out for being a passing point and a suggested visit on the itinerary of the Vía de la Plata. Among its heritage, the hermitage of the Virgen del Castillo stands out, located on the banks of a branch of the Esla reservoir, and the church of San Miguel Arcángel, which functions as a parish church. Montamarta is popularly known as the "town of the storks", due to its countless nesting sites, invited and motivated to their annual stay by the wetland of the Esla reservoir and the proximity of the Villafáfila lagoons.

title: (24240) Santa María del Páramo - 7 Avenida de Asturias
title_short: (24240) Santa María del Páramo - 7 Avenida de Asturias
description: Ample parking for the supermarket, places with no height limit.

title: (47850) Villanueva de los Caballeros - Área de descanso
title_short: (47850) Villanueva de los Caballeros - Área de descanso
description: Rest area with picnic areas. Shadowless area. Lots of parking spaces.

title: (49550) Ferreruela - 49 Diseminado Diseminados
description: The Ferreruela de Tábara overnight area is located on the outskirts of the town very close to its main road. It belongs to the Raia Norte Route (the first cross-border motorhome route in Europe) and has 8 parking spaces, a gray water emptying area and a terminal for changing black water, in addition, drinking water can be recharged. It also has a video surveillance camera and a Wi-Fi point. It is located in the mountainous area of La Sierra de la Culebra, whose main attraction is the populations of the emblematic Iberian wolf. Both in Ferreruela and in its Sesnández and Escober districts, you can enjoy some very beautiful tourist routes that pass through local trails and guide the visitor through the constructions of traditional corrals, recovered natural sources, pools, water troughs, irrigation wheels and a environment of great natural and scenic wealth.

title: (49730) - A-66
description: Picnic area in both directions. It has only tables and at the moment it has no shade. It has many parking spaces. and several of them for large vehicles

title: (24233) Adanero - Autovía Ruta de la Plata
title_short: (24233) Adanero - Autovía Ruta de la Plata
description: Stop en route on the a66 off the road.

title: (49840) Vezdemarbán - 29 Lugar Diseminados
description: Parking of the municipal swimming pool, level concrete floor, drinking water and tables. In summer possibility of access to the swimming pool with showers and toilets. Small charming town, you can visit quickly. Recommended.

title: (24224) Cabreros del Río - 9T Calle D
description: Street cut with 10 free parking. It has barbecue area, fountain, public pool. In the village there is pharmacy, shop, tobacconist, playground ...

title: (49163) Manzanal del Barco -
description: Very nice little spot, alone in the world with a view of the Douero. Access is via a small path with a little slope but we passed without problem with a traffic-type van (although the vegetation “caressed” the body a little bit). If your vehicle is bigger then it won't fit. it is possible to go down to the river to swim. View of the stars in the 1st row.

title: (49162) Palacios del Pan - 24 ZA-P-1405
description: Large clearing, grass and gravel, just off the no-through road to the old bridge. We stayed under the trees - peaceful, shady and beautiful but you could drive down the slightly bumpy and steep track right down to the lake. We didn’t think it was nice down there because you hear the traffic noise from the bridge

title: (24230) Valdevimbre - 7 Calle de Manuel Cadenas
description: Soccer field parking. Small town for gastronomic visit. Variety of restaurants located underground in what were once the wineries.

title: (24230) Valdevimbre - 12 Travesía Calvo Sotelo
description: Village recreation area. Next to a small lake with ducks. Most of the tables are in the sun. Very quiet area. We haven't gotten to sleep but I don't think there would be a problem.

title: (49162) Andavías - 78 Diseminado Diseminados
description: It is on the outskirts of town, 3 or 4 vehicles would enter, parking is not indicated, but since it doesn't bother me, I don't think there are any problems.

title: (49183) Almendra del Pan -

title_short: (49162) Palacios del Pan - 10 Calle Onesimo Redondo

description: Place to sleep, quiet night we were alone. Access path not suitable for large vehicles.

title: (49162) Palacios del Pan - Unnamed Road
description: Very very beautiful area, very quiet. With public showers, bathing areas

title: (24356) Villazala - 1014 Lugar San Pelayo
description: Give us a very quiet night completely alone. Very pleasant environment on the banks of the Orbigo River and with a great river poscina. During the day in the summer months it is full of people, especially on weekends. Eye!. Do not follow the directions of Google GPS. It takes you to the opposite side of the river and there is no access. To get there you have to reach the village of Villoria de Orbigo and cross it. There are some indicative signs, but they are not very clear. When in doubt better ask.

title: (49183) Almendra - 24 Calle Río
description: Ideal place for picnic and overnight, quiet, level with unbeatable views of the swamp of Ricobayo. It has a water source

title: (49530) Coreses - 6 Carretera Algodre
description: On the way to Portugal we stopped to eat there. Picnic table in full sun.

title: (49183) Campillo -
description:
Magnificent view of the lake, alone in the world.
The access path is passable for a van without any problem and there are no contraindications to use it.
Just after the building you have a large flat space.
In addition there is 4G.
Possible walk to the lake and possibility of seeing the submerged village when the lake is low.
Small flat for the wind.

title: (24350) Veguellina de Órbigo - 8 Calle Doctor Basilio López
title_short: (24350) Veguellina de Órbigo - 8 Calle Doctor Basilio López
description: Parking in the urban area, next to a park and the town center, with supermarkets, restaurants, etc. Next to it passes a train track with little night traffic. You can spend the night without problems. On Friday mornings there is a market in the center of town and this is the car park that people use that day. It is a town with atmosphere in summer and various activities.

title: (24350) Veguellina de Órbigo - 45J Avenida el Páramo
title_short: (24350) Veguellina de Órbigo - 45J Avenida el Páramo
description: Great parking to spend day and night. On the banks of the Órbigo river with a shaded area, tables, park, sports area, municipal swimming pool, barbecues, public bathrooms ... etc. Fantastic bar Restaurant next door. A visit is recommended in summer to go down the river by canoe, with a local company, open pools and a beautiful river. Trout fishing area. Exceptional place. No emptying service.

title: (24225) Villanueva de las Manzanas - 18 LE-512
description: The service station next to the Los Oteros motorway. There is a wide plunge for the truck, gas station, restaurant, shower ...

title: (24225) Campo de Villavidel - 9 Autovía Camino de Santiago
title_short: (24225) Campo de Villavidel - 9 Autovía Camino de Santiago
description: Rest area on the side of the road with a small restaurant and Repsol gas station, ideal for spending a night on the road

title: (49022) - 51E Carretera Tordesillas
description: Down the street behind the area and the gas station. Flat concrete esplanade next to a hermitage. Quiet to spend the night. In the Area it is only for services. Good flirt in passing. We were heading to Plasencia from Leon we stopped for the night

title: (49022) Zamora - r N-122, 453 Carr. Villagodio, 8 D
title_short: (49022) Zamora - r N-122, 453 Carr. Villagodio, 8 D
description: Service area in the gas station. Filling with water and electricity against payment. Free gray and black vacuum.

title: (24251) Banuncias - 5T Calle Comercio
description: A place with trees where you can park the van in the shade in front of it there is a pool and a bar until 1 o'clock, music was played but a quiet place to spend the night.

title: (49024) Zamora - 14 Carretera Villacastín-Vigo
description: Decathlon parking. Good place to spend the night, calm and bright. The next day you can load and fill the area of Calle de los Pisones in the capital Zamora

title: (24392) Villar de Mazarife -
description: Grassy area next to a small pond, along the way to Santiago de Compostela with a drinking water point. No direct access to the grass by vehicle but access to the path which borders it and which therefore gives directly to the area. Very pleasant. Road with little traffic

title: (49026) Zamora - 177 Diseminado Diseminados
description:
Repsol gas station directly at the exit to Zamora.
Coming from the west (E82) you first have to pass the gas station, turn around and drive back.

Here you can exchange Portuguese gas bottles from Repsol for Spanish gas bottles from Repsol.
Fee for the exchange plus price for the gas filling. Butane is also available.

The staff speak English, are very friendly and helpful.

title: (49023) Zamora - 12 Calle de San Blas
description: Self-service laundry. LavaAhora is a laundry in the Galleries of the Valderaduey Shopping Center (Carrefour). It has Free Parking, Air Conditioning, wifi. Washers and dryers where while you do your laundry, you can do the shopping without wasting a minute of your time.

title: (49024) Zamora - 129 Calle de la Hiniesta
description: Very clean laundry room, good washers and dryers. Good parking, next to a Polygon. Close to Bars, Pharmacy, Bakery, etc.

title: (49021) Zamora - 4 Paseo Tres Árboles
description: Fairly flat car park on the edge of a spectacular park. supermarket at 200m

title: (49159) Villaralbo - 18 Diseminado Diseminados
description: at the exit of Zamora along the douro. Large strip of grass along a very little used road. Picnic tables and the immediate proximity to the river. Very quiet night. In the morning a few walkers and fishermen.
